title: Services
text:
10mapz provides spatial data visualization services for research, government, and industry. We specialize in exploratory data analysis, high-quality map production, and the development of interactive dashboards.
Our services include:

Spatial Data Analysis: We provide comprehensive analytical services to identify patterns, trends, and insights within your spatial datasets.
Cartographic Production: We create high-quality, accurate maps suitable for publication, presentations, and reports, ensuring effective communication of your spatial information.
Dashboard Design & Development: We design and develop interactive dashboards to facilitate dynamic data exploration, analysis, and visualization, customized to your specific requirements.

Contact us to discuss your project and how we can assist in visualizing your spatial data. [Contact Us]
10mapz provides spatial data visualization services for research, government, and industry. We specialize in exploratory data analysis, high-quality map production, and the development of interactive dashboards.

title: Courses
text:
We provide both introductory and intermediate/advanced courses on spatial data exploration, analysis, and visualization.

Spatial data exploration, analysis, and visualization in R ( scheduled 6-9 May 2025 at PRstats)
General data exploration with R (on demand)
Introduction to data visualization (on demand)

Our courses are designed to provide practical, hands-on experience to help you master data analysis and visualization tools.

title: 10mapz
text:
We love mapping!
Exploring spatial data with easy-to-use tools. Analysing spatial data patterns.

title: About
text:
Martijn Tennekes is a part-time freelancer, with 20 years of experience in teaching, academic research, and consulting. He is affiliated with Statistics Netherlands where he contributed to several international research projects, was course leader for several courses organized by the European Commission (Eurostat). Martijn has a strong background in academics, in particular game theory, data visualization, spatial data, and statistical programming. He received his Ph. D in 2010 at Maastricht University and also collaborated extensively with other universities, including Eindhoven University, the University of Münster, and the University of Oxford. Martijn is the main author of several popular R packages, including tmap and cols4all.



Martijn Tennekes


In his free time, Martijn enjoys playing guitar, doing outdoor sports, and spending time with his family.

title: Workshops
text:
Our workshops offer focused, hands-on training in key topics related to spatial data visualization and analysis. Designed for professionals, students, and enthusiasts, these short and intensive sessions help you quickly gain new skills.

Workshop Format
Workshops can be delivered on-site at your institution or remotely via Zoom or your preferred platform. Each session is designed to be highly interactive and practical, equipping you with skills you can apply immediately. Workshops include an engaging introduction, hands-on exercises, and collaborative activities to ensure an immersive learning experience.
Currently, no workshops are pre-scheduled, but I am available to organize sessions based on interest. You can choose from the suggested topics below or reach out to discuss a custom workshop tailored to your needs.


Potential Workshop Topics

Getting Started with R – Learn the basics of R for data analysis and visualization.
Getting Started with tmap – Create beautiful and effective maps using the tmap package.
It’s All About Colors – Master color palette selection for clear and compelling visualizations.
Spatial Data Exploration – Uncover patterns and insights in your spatial datasets.

Interested in organizing a workshop? Contact me to discuss your needs and explore custom options!
